actions.committee: Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide cabinet-level status to the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs.

summary.text: Provides that the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs for purposes of annual compensation shall be placed in Level I of the Executive Schedule. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 5312)

titles.title: A bill to provide cabinet-level status to the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs.
